releaseNotes: 👨‍⚕️ NEW: Senior CRM Pharmacist Role - New role with same permissions as Junior CRM Specialist
🔧 FIXED: Position dropdowns in admin interface now include Senior CRM Pharmacist
🔧 UPDATED: Senior CRM Pharmacist cannot see Employee Management group and Dashboard
🔧 FIXED: Senior CRM Pharmacist now has full access to Total Orders, My Orders, and Create Orders
🔧 FIXED: Resolved 'Checking permissions...' loop in order management pages
🔧 FIXED: Resolved 'Loading all orders...' loop in Total Orders page
📅 NEW: Month Filter - Filter orders by month in Total Orders and My Orders pages
🤖 NEW: Chatbot Access - Senior CRM Pharmacist now has access to the AI chatbot
📊 NEW: Month-Specific Statistics - View stats now show data for the selected month only
👨‍💻 NEW: Digital Solution Manager Role - Developer role with full access to all pages and features
🔧 NEW: Fix Calculator - Recalculate all shifts based on assigned shift durations
🔄 NEW: Shift Change functionality in Team Shifts - Change shifts directly from monthly shifts table
📅 NEW: Bulk Assignment in Shift Management - Assign shifts for entire months with one click
⏰ NEW: Automatic Friday Day Off - Set Fridays as day off automatically in bulk assignments
🎯 NEW: Real-time shift duration calculations - Uses actual shift start/end times from database
💡 NEW: Auto-recalculation of regular/overtime hours when shifts are changed
🛡️ Enhanced permission system - Content & Creative Managers can now edit events and Q&A
📊 Improved shift management efficiency - Bulk operations save hours of manual work
👑 NEW: General Manager Role - Executive-level role with same access as Executive Director
🌟 NEW: Full System Access - General Manager has unlimited access to all pages, dashboards, and features
🔐 NEW: Enhanced Security - General Manager bypasses all route guards and permission checks
